title: Donald Trump says he'd be honored if Kennedy Jr endorses him: 'Women love...'
content: ​​Former president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump Thursday reacted to the speculations of independent candidate RKF Jr dropping out of the race and endorsing him. Appearing on the Fox News, Trump said Kennedy Jr is a different kind of a guy. ​"But, overall, I thought the Democrats, he was a Democrat, I don’t know what he is right now. But he was a Democrat. They treated him very badly. I think he would have, he goes around saying he would have beaten Biden in the primary. I think there was a good chance," Trump said.
summary: ​​Former president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump Thursday reacted to the speculations of independent candidate RKF Jr dropping out of the race and endorsing him. Appearing on the Fox News, Trump said Kennedy Jr is a different kind of a guy. ​"But, overall, I thought the Democrats, he was a Democrat, I don’t know what he is right now. But he was a Democrat. They treated him very badly. I think he would have, he goes around saying he would have beaten Biden in the primary. I think there was a good chance," Trump said.

title: Who is Tahil Sharma, interfaith activist who concluded DNC's third day with Hindu and Sikh prayers?
content: Interfaith activist Tahil Sharma wrapped up the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago with Hindu and Sikh prayers, joined by Rev. William Emmanuel Hall. They emphasized peace for Palestine and Israel after Minnesota governor Tim Walz accepted the vice-presidential nomination. Sharma supports interfaith communities and advocates for justice and equity.
summary: Interfaith activist Tahil Sharma wrapped up the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago with Hindu and Sikh prayers, joined by Rev. William Emmanuel Hall. They emphasized peace for Palestine and Israel after Minnesota governor Tim Walz accepted the vice-presidential nomination. Sharma supports interfaith communities and advocates for justice and equity.

title: 'Tragedy of Shakespearan proportions': Tragic story of Mike Lynch and his Bayesian superyacht that capsized near Sicily
content: Brent Hoberman, founder of lastminute.com and a friend of Lynch, told the BBC, "It's deeply tragic, and the timing feels like something out of a Shakespearean tragedy. He had just spent 12 years fighting to clear his name and was on a celebratory cruise with those who stood by him during that incredibly difficult period."
summary: Brent Hoberman, founder of lastminute.com and a friend of Lynch, told the BBC, "It's deeply tragic, and the timing feels like something out of a Shakespearean tragedy. He had just spent 12 years fighting to clear his name and was on a celebratory cruise with those who stood by him during that incredibly difficult period."

title: Unacceptable: Muslim Women for Harris withdraws support after Palestinian speaker refused slot
content: ​They wanted a slot for a Palestinian-American speaker at the Democratic National Convention. Wednesday evening, they got a call from the organizers and the reply was 'no' following which Muslim Women for Harris announced that they are disbanding and can't continue to support Kamala Harris and Tim Walz. “This is a terrible message to send to Democrats. Palestinians have the right to speak about Palestine. We pray that the DNC and VP Harris team makes the right decision before this convention is over. For the sake of each of us,” the statement from Muslim Women for Harris said.
summary: ​They wanted a slot for a Palestinian-American speaker at the Democratic National Convention. Wednesday evening, they got a call from the organizers and the reply was 'no' following which Muslim Women for Harris announced that they are disbanding and can't continue to support Kamala Harris and Tim Walz. “This is a terrible message to send to Democrats. Palestinians have the right to speak about Palestine. We pray that the DNC and VP Harris team makes the right decision before this convention is over. For the sake of each of us,” the statement from Muslim Women for Harris said.

title: Gus Walz vs Barron Trump storms Internet as Dem leaders' children take spotlight
content: As Guz Walz gave the moment of the day on Wednesday in DNC, the Republicans sharpened their claw to attack Tim Walz's son calling him a 'retad'. A social media post comparing 17-year-old Gus Walz with 18-year-old Barron Trump went viral drawing flak from commentators who said children of both Dem and Republican leaders should not be attacked.
summary: As Guz Walz gave the moment of the day on Wednesday in DNC, the Republicans sharpened their claw to attack Tim Walz's son calling him a 'retad'. A social media post comparing 17-year-old Gus Walz with 18-year-old Barron Trump went viral drawing flak from commentators who said children of both Dem and Republican leaders should not be attacked.

title: When Oprah Winfrey was 'in LOVE' with Trump: Republicans dig dirt and letter after DNC speech
content: Oprah Winfrey received strong backlash from MAGA supporters following her endorsement of Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention. Republicans circulated old videos and letters showing Oprah's past admiration for Donald Trump. Despite her earlier endorsements of Barack Obama, Hillary Clinton, Joe Biden, and Jon Fetterman, this is her first appearance at a political convention.
summary: Oprah Winfrey received strong backlash from MAGA supporters following her endorsement of Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention. Republicans circulated old videos and letters showing Oprah's past admiration for Donald Trump. Despite her earlier endorsements of Barack Obama, Hillary Clinton, Joe Biden, and Jon Fetterman, this is her first appearance at a political convention.

title: Five minutes after take off, aircraft crash-lands near school in Australia
content: A Piper PA-28 aircraft, carrying a man and a woman, faced engine failure just minutes after taking off from Bankstown Airport. The pilot executed an emergency landing near Bossley Park, leading to minor injuries for both occupants. The crash happened near a school, with the Australian Transport Safety Bureau now investigating the incident.
summary: A Piper PA-28 aircraft, carrying a man and a woman, faced engine failure just minutes after taking off from Bankstown Airport. The pilot executed an emergency landing near Bossley Park, leading to minor injuries for both occupants. The crash happened near a school, with the Australian Transport Safety Bureau now investigating the incident.

title: Sri Lanka threats on basic freedoms 'concerning': UN
content: The United Nations Human Rights Office on Thursday said basic freedoms in Sri Lanka were under threat, as the country gears up to elect a new president in September. "This trend is particularly concerning as the country is in an important pre-election period," UN Human Rights Chief Volker Turk said in a statement.
summary: The United Nations Human Rights Office on Thursday said basic freedoms in Sri Lanka were under threat, as the country gears up to elect a new president in September. "This trend is particularly concerning as the country is in an important pre-election period," UN Human Rights Chief Volker Turk said in a statement.

title: China opposes any country allowing Dalai Lama to visit: Foreign ministry
content: China has expressed opposition to countries allowing Dalai Lama visits, following his meetings with US state department and White House officials. The Chinese foreign ministry views the Dalai Lama as a separatist figure and urged the US to honor its commitments to China and cease interactions with the Dalai Lama group, stressing the anti-China nature of such activities.
summary: China has expressed opposition to countries allowing Dalai Lama visits, following his meetings with US state department and White House officials. The Chinese foreign ministry views the Dalai Lama as a separatist figure and urged the US to honor its commitments to China and cease interactions with the Dalai Lama group, stressing the anti-China nature of such activities.

title: Watch: Man opens aircraft's emergency exit, walks on wing at Australian airport
content: The incident took place when Jetstar Flight JQ507 arrived at Melbourne Airport from Sydney and parked at a terminal gate. The man exited the aircraft through the right-side emergency exit, officials informed.
summary: The incident took place when Jetstar Flight JQ507 arrived at Melbourne Airport from Sydney and parked at a terminal gate. The man exited the aircraft through the right-side emergency exit, officials informed.

title: GOP defectors rally behind Kamala Harris, criticise Trump's 'cult-like' influence
content: At the Democratic convention, significant figures from both parties endorse Kamala Harris for the 2024 election. Some Republicans criticise Trump, highlighting concerns about his leadership and influence on the GOP. They urge Republicans and independents to view Harris as a viable alternative, portraying Trump as a danger to democracy.
summary: At the Democratic convention, significant figures from both parties endorse Kamala Harris for the 2024 election. Some Republicans criticise Trump, highlighting concerns about his leadership and influence on the GOP. They urge Republicans and independents to view Harris as a viable alternative, portraying Trump as a danger to democracy.

title: Matthew Perry’s death: ‘Friends’ star’s bedroom a ‘disaster’ in final hours, described as a ‘long bender’ scene, claims report
Paraguay open to China trade deals despite Taiwan ties, Pena says
content: Paraguay's long-standing diplomatic support for Taiwan has hindered local farmers' grains exports to China, which claims sovereignty over the self-governed island. Paraguay is the only South American country with formal relations with Taiwan, which strongly objects to China's sovereignty claims.
summary: Paraguay's long-standing diplomatic support for Taiwan has hindered local farmers' grains exports to China, which claims sovereignty over the self-governed island. Paraguay is the only South American country with formal relations with Taiwan, which strongly objects to China's sovereignty claims.

title: Is Bill Clinton ill? Former US president's fragile DNC speech with trembling hands and raspy voice causes concern
content: Former President Bill Clinton, 78, spoke at the Democratic National Convention with noticeable signs of aging. He hinted that due to health concerns, this might be his last attendance. Clinton commended Vice Presidential nominee Tim Walz and outgoing President Biden. Using notes instead of a teleprompter, Clinton delivered his speech reflecting on his long history with the conventions.
summary: Former President Bill Clinton, 78, spoke at the Democratic National Convention with noticeable signs of aging. He hinted that due to health concerns, this might be his last attendance. Clinton commended Vice Presidential nominee Tim Walz and outgoing President Biden. Using notes instead of a teleprompter, Clinton delivered his speech reflecting on his long history with the conventions.

title: Donald Trump terms Josh Shapiro 'highly overrated Jewish governor' after his freedom speech at DNC
content: Donald Trump launched a critique against Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro following Shapiro's Democratic National Convention comments. Trump branded Shapiro as 'highly overrated,' insisting that Shapiro disregarded his contributions to Israel. Trump also accused Vice President Kamala Harris of 'hating Israel,' a statement that critics have condemned as antisemitic. Shapiro dismissed Trump's claims.
summary: Donald Trump launched a critique against Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro following Shapiro's Democratic National Convention comments. Trump branded Shapiro as 'highly overrated,' insisting that Shapiro disregarded his contributions to Israel. Trump also accused Vice President Kamala Harris of 'hating Israel,' a statement that critics have condemned as antisemitic. Shapiro dismissed Trump's claims.

title: 'I’m allergic to my period!': UK woman's struggle with a rare condition
Who is Gus Walz? The 17-year-old son of Tim Walz with learning disorder who stole the spotlight at DNC
Did Queen Elizabeth really find Trump 'very rude'? The answer might surprise you
content: A former Buckingham Palace aide dismissed claims from an upcoming biography that Queen Elizabeth II found Donald Trump rude during his visits. The aide stated that the Queen had described Trump and his family as gracious and wonderful guests. The controversy arises from differing accounts about Trump's behavior and the Queen's impressions during state visits.
summary: A former Buckingham Palace aide dismissed claims from an upcoming biography that Queen Elizabeth II found Donald Trump rude during his visits. The aide stated that the Queen had described Trump and his family as gracious and wonderful guests. The controversy arises from differing accounts about Trump's behavior and the Queen's impressions during state visits.
